entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023
